Professional

It's my hope that if you are viewing this page, it's because I applied to a job that you are hiring for, and I want you to consider me - that's awesome! Feel free to view my resumé, or review some of my skills below.


Me in a nutshell: I'm a software engineer with 6 years of professional experience working on various software projects, websites, and web applications. I have a particular interest in Javascript and tools associated with it, though I enjoy learning about and working with other languages as well. I don't know everything, nor will I ever claim to. What I am good at is finding answers when I am stuck, figuring out things on my own, and owning up to my mistakes.
